[[Image:Blackmont Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Blackmont on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Blackmont''' is a castle in [[Dorne]], the region controlled by [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]]. The castle is located in the far west of Dorne near the border with the Reach. It is north of [[Starfall]] and east of [[Skyreach]], on the [[Torentine]] River in the foothills of the [[Red Mountains]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/dorne/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Dorne entry]</ref>

It is the seat of the eponymous [[House Blackmont]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Blackmont is the same.
